The '''rod of frigid destruction''' is a [[rod]] which contains several [[Ice Magic]] spells. Like all [[rod]]s, its effectiveness rises with your [[Evocations]] skill. 

==Strategy==
[[Freezing Cloud]] is the main highlight from this rod. Instead of having to train a triple-school spell, frigid destruction lets you cast it with just Evocations. The other two spells can be useful, both being raw damage abilities.

==History==
Rods of frigid destruction were added in [[0.13]] and removed in [[0.14]].
